name: Corretta Login
children: When I click on element Accedi_Login
Given I click on Annulla_Impronta_Digitale if present
When I input data into Edit_Phone
When I click on element Button_Continue
When I receive the latest email with subject Generazione OTP
When I receive the latest email with subject [Generazione OTP]
When I input data into OTPInput
When I input data into InputPassword
